verbose_text: To determine if the absence of some of the Shroom3 and Folr1 protein may have an effect on the phosphorylation and activation of myosin II and/or MLCK, neural epithelial sections of control and E9.0 Shroom3 +/Gt; Folr1 +/flox embryos were immunolabeled with antibodies specific for pMLC and pMLCK (XREF_FIG I-L).
evidence: phosphorylation and activation of myosin II and/or MLCK
